snippet.title: NES Longplay [284] The Terminator
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by JagOfTroy

Developed by Radical Entertainment(this game is anything but rad or entertaining) and was published by Mindscape and Bethesda Softworks(yes, the company that brought you Fallout 3 and Elder Scrolls).
An easy synopsis of the game, what a piece of crap. No continues, very unforgiving level design and enemy placement. 
When Kyle Reese goes back to the past, he's only armed with his fists and feet for attacking but yet there are certain levels he gets a firearm only to be taken away when it goes back to the platforming.
It is said to be one of the worst 'The Terminator' games of all time and after having suffered through that, I believe they are right. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
